### enum class  {#a07f17102dd54c318b10c6c6009e27e1e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum class llvm::remarks::BitstreamRemarkContainerType "
 labels = {["strong"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> of the remark container.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a07f17102dd54c318b10c6c6009e27e1ea4169738237fc9d6c1463bd5260de6c91" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SeparateRemarksMeta">
The metadata emitted separately
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a07f17102dd54c318b10c6c6009e27e1ea2a431092369d68b3ddf5f61852fee1a9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SeparateRemarksFile">
The remarks emitted separately
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a07f17102dd54c318b10c6c6009e27e1ea5c80f101108a356211fcb26b3f83eabb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Standalone">
Everything is emitted together
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a07f17102dd54c318b10c6c6009e27e1ea7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04" />
<EnumerationListItem name="First">
 (= SeparateRemarksMeta)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a07f17102dd54c318b10c6c6009e27e1ead55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Last">
 (= Standalone)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

The remark container has two modes:
<ul>
<li>separate: the metadata is separate from the remarks and points to the auxiliary file that contains the remarks.</li>
<li>standalone: the metadata and the remarks are emitted together.</li>
</ul>

MessagePack types as defined in the standard, with the exception of Integer being divided into a signed Int and unsigned UInt variant in order to map directly to C++ types.

The types map onto corresponding union members of the <code>Object</code> struct.
